column3: I think this is ready to merge if it compiles

Concept ACK

FWIW:

```
$ git grep BTC -- "*.cpp" "*.h" ":(exclude)src/qt/" ":(exclude)src/wallet/test/" ":(exclude)src/test/" | grep -vE ': *(//|\*)'
src/policy/feerate.cpp:const std::string CURRENCY_UNIT = "BTC";
src/validation.cpp:        LogPrint(BCLog::MEMPOOL, "replacing tx %s with %s for %s BTC additional fees, %d delta bytes
",
src/wallet/rpcwallet.cpp:            "

> Concept ACK

ACK 7df0cf719fecf1b8d09801295db8bd2137bfe033\nDoesn't change any translation strings so can go into 0.20.0.

```suggestion
                                     "Must be at least 0.0001 " + CURRENCY_UNIT + " per kB higher than the current transaction fee rate.
"},
```

Can shorten the string now that it is touched for other reasons
Makes sense, I've applied the change.  I'll squash everything into a single commit when review is otherwise done.

```suggestion
        LogPrint(BCLog::MEMPOOL, "replacing tx %s with %s for %s additional fees, %d delta bytes
",
```

I think we can just remove the unit here
Good point, I agree as this is just a log message and not really user visible.  I've removed it here.
